title: Let's roll. First roll ending in 42 decides what champ I must play until I get rank 5 mastery.
body:
That's right, I will not be allowed to play anything but this one champion until I have gotten them to rank 5. Hold me to it. My match history is wide open.

I advise not listing champions I have already gotten to rank 5 mastery so you can torture me to the maximum which include: Janna, Quinn, Thresh, Nautilus, Anivia and Ezreal.

Let those virtual dice fly, boys.

> [{quoted}](name=Hackulator,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=Y77J1iwq,comment-id=002f,timestamp=2015-11-04T03:04:40.141+0000)
>
> [roll] {{champion:27}}
> 
> I win

Aaaand that's that. I'll update with progress on my new quest to master Singed.

Step 1 - Bind laugh to accessible key....

UPDATE: S+ Singed game :D

http://imgur.com/qGOiYe0

Final update: The journey concludes. What a ride it was. Proxy lyfe.

http://imgur.com/45pSX8D
